long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hilanet's attendance form contains multiple rows, one for each day of attendance. To fill each row you normally check the "normal hours" checkbox, and change the status to "Work". This extension performs these actions for each row automatically, you simply choose the relevant days and the extensions checks all "normal hours" checkboxes and changes all statuses to "Work". The extension doesn't send the form, doesn't choose the dates, and won't do anything outside of your control. It will only help you in filling the form instead of doing it manually per work day.
